scripts.graph:deps:dot: depcruise --config .dependency-cruiser.js --output-type dot app lib components utils > docs/architecture/graphs/deps-graph.dot
scripts.graph:deps:svg: echo 'SVG rendering skipped (no Graphviz). Use deps-graph.dot instead.'
scripts.graph:deps:json: depcruise --config .dependency-cruiser.js --output-type json app lib components utils > docs/architecture/graphs/deps-graph.json
scripts.graph:deps: npm run graph:deps:dot && npm run graph:deps:svg
scripts.graph:madge: madge --ts-config tsconfig.json --json app lib components utils > docs/architecture/graphs/madge.json
scripts.graph:all: npm run graph:deps && npm run graph:deps:json && npm run graph:madge && npm run graph:calls && npm run graph:routes
